from sklearn.metrics import r2_score,mean_squared_error
coefficient_of_dermination = r2_score(y_pred, y_test)
print('R2 Score = ',coefficient_of_dermination)
error=mean_squared_error(y_pred, y_test)
print('Error = ',error)
